---
title: "extend_1.toml"
---

## High-level description
This TOML configuration file extends the Gitleaks configuration by including another configuration file and defining a rule for detecting AWS Access Keys. It demonstrates the use of configuration extension and custom rule definition in Gitleaks.

## Symbols

### `title`
#### Description
Specifies the title of the configuration as "gitleaks extended 1".

### `[extend]`
#### Description
Defines the extension configuration, specifying the path to another TOML file to be included.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| path | string | Relative path to the extended configuration file |

### `[[rules]]`
#### Description
Defines a rule for detecting AWS Access Keys using a regular expression.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| description | string | Description of the rule |
| id | string | Unique identifier for the rule |
| regex | string | Regular expression pattern for detecting AWS Access Keys |
| tags | array of strings | Labels associated with the rule |

## Dependencies
This configuration file depends on another TOML file specified in the `[extend]` section:
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| ../testdata/config/extend_2.toml | Extends the current configuration with additional settings |

## Configuration
The file defines the following configuration options:
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| title | string | "gitleaks extended 1" | Title of the configuration |
| extend.path | string | "../testdata/config/extend_2.toml" | Path to the extended configuration file |
| rules | array | [See `[[rules]]` section] | Array of rule definitions |

## API/Interface Reference
The file defines one rule for detecting AWS Access Keys:
| Rule ID | Description | Regex Pattern | Tags |
|:--------|:------------|:--------------|:-----|
| aws-access-key | AWS Access Key | `(A3T[A-Z0-9]|AKIA|AGPA|AIDA|AROA|AIPA|ANPA|ANVA|ASIA)[A-Z0-9]{16}` | ["key", "AWS"] |

This configuration file is part of the Gitleaks test data and demonstrates how to extend configurations and define custom rules for detecting sensitive information in source code repositories.
